title: Trouble Honey Days
sinopse:
1. Trouble Honey Days- Studentâ€™s parents are in large debt and have run off, so he becomes slave of his classmate.

2. That Artless Guy- Hisato is in love with Masaru who comes to the onsen where he works and always complains about his poor love life...

3. Start Position #1- Hisato and Masaru still have sexual encounters but it doesn't seem like Masaru is serious about it. There's a new guy in town and he keeps teasing Hisato after overhearing his cries of passion...

4. Start Position #2.

5. Heart Class- A student who is a member of the occult club falls in love with a vampire.

6. Spicy Cherry.

[ from B-U ]
